article.description: Rob Jones had 24 points and 11 rebounds, and Matthew Dellavedova scored a career-high 23 points, leading Saint Mary's to a 75-56 victory Tuesday.
article.headline: UC Riverside can't handle St. Mary's on road
article.linkText: UC Riverside can't handle St. Mary's on road
article.story: MORAGA, Calif. -- Rob Jones had 24 points and 11 rebounds, and Matthew Dellavedova scored a career-high 23 points, leading Saint Mary's to a 75-56 victory Tuesday night over UC Riverside. The Gaels (8-2), who improved to 7-0 at home, had eight points and seven assists from guard Mickey McConnell. Senior guard Javon Borum led UC Riverside (3-6) with 15 points, and Phil Martin had seven points and seven rebounds for the Highlanders. Jones, a transfer from San Diego, set his scoring high as a Gael. He scored 27 against Loyola Marymount as a freshman for San Diego. Jones shot 9-for-15 from the field and 6-for-9 from 3-point range. Dellavedova was 9 of 17 from the field and 5 of 10 from long range while dishing out seven assists. Leading just 41-35 with under 14 minutes left, the Gaels went on a 22-5 run, jumping their lead to a commanding 63-40.

statistics.description: The number of points scored.

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

statistics.description: The total number of minutes played.

statistics.name: assistTurnoverRatio
statistics.description: The average number of assists a player or team records per turnover
